articles.description: Adani Enterprises Ltd., the group’s flagship, has agreed to acquire a ‘significant minority stake’ in Cleartrip for an undisclosed sum
articles.content:
Billionaire Gautam Adanis Adani Group is buying a stake in online travel aggregator Cleartrip Pvt Ltd. as domestic travel rebounds in India after pandemic-led movement curbs were eased.
